document_data.name: Mindworm
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mindworm''''' was a spell of [[Nergal (archdevil)|Nergal]]'s creation that stole memories.
document_data.Effect: A subject under the effects of ''mindworm'' could be forced to recall a memory, which was shared with the caster; however, upon being recalled, the memory was gone from the target's mind.
document_data.History: The [[archdevil]] [[Nergal (archdevil)|Nergal]] employed that spell on [[Elminster Aumar]] upon capturing him, while the wizard was lost in [[Avernus]], meaning to steal the secrets of [[silver fire]] from the mage's mind.
document_data.Compoments: Nergal kissed Elminster before telling him to "taste" the mindworm. The kiss may have been a part of the casting, or an infernal taunt.
